EmailTemplate.description: Manufacturers of Spun Yarns made from DuPont™ Nomex® and Kevlar® Cut Staple
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Manufacturers of Spun Yarns made from DuPont™ Nomex® and Kevlar® Cut Stapl
EmailTemplate.subject: Manufacturers of Spun Yarns made from DuPont™ Nomex® and Kevlar® Cut Staple
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar® and Nomex ®.
Beside continuous fiber, DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex ® is available in a cut staple fiber which is spun into fiber. These spun fibers are then woven into fabrics or knitted to manufacture garments.
To locate the list of companies that take the cut staple fiber and manufacture spun yarns,copy and paste the web address below into your web browser.
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=20&prodNum=20
Thank you for your visit to DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar®, Tyvek® and other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
